20101201001011.000|20101201001012.250|CCO|   [ Man #2 ] I NEED TO FOCUS.
20101201001012.250|20101201001013.500|CCO|      [ Female Announcer ]
20101201001013.500|20101201001014.750|CCO|       DEPRESSION HURTS.
20101201001014.750|20101201001016.000|CCO|       CYMBALTA CAN HELP
20101201001016.000|20101201001017.111|CCO|       WITH MANY SYMPTOMS
20101201001017.111|20101201001018.222|CCO|         OF DEPRESSION.
20101201001018.222|20101201001019.333|CCO|  TELL YOUR DOCTOR RIGHT AWAY
20101201001019.333|20101201001020.444|CCO|  IF YOUR DEPRESSION WORSENS,
20101201001020.444|20101201001021.556|CCO|    YOU HAVE UNUSUAL CHANGES
20101201001021.556|20101201001022.667|CCO|          IN BEHAVIOR
20101201001022.667|20101201001023.778|CCO|    OR THOUGHTS OF SUICIDE.
20101201001023.778|20101201001024.889|CCO|        ANTIDEPRESSANTS
20101201001024.889|20101201001026.000|CCO|       CAN INCREASE THESE
20101201001026.000|20101201001027.000|CCO|      IN CHILDREN, TEENS,
20101201001027.000|20101201001028.000|CCO|       AND YOUNG ADULTS.
20101201001028.000|20101201001029.000|CCO|    CYMBALTA IS NOT APPROVED
20101201001029.000|20101201001030.000|CCO|     FOR CHILDREN UNDER 18.
20101201001030.000|20101201001031.000|CCO|      PEOPLE TAKING MAOIS
20101201001031.000|20101201001032.000|CCO|        OR THIORIDAZINE
20101201001032.000|20101201001033.000|CCO| OR WITH UNCONTROLLED GLAUCOMA
20101201001033.000|20101201001034.000|CCO|   SHOULD NOT TAKE CYMBALTA.
20101201001034.000|20101201001035.000|CCO|           TAKING IT
20101201001035.000|20101201001036.000|CCO|   WITH NSAID PAIN RELIEVERS,
20101201001036.000|20101201001037.111|CCO|  ASPIRIN, OR BLOOD THINNERS
20101201001037.111|20101201001038.222|CCO|  MAY INCREASE BLEEDING RISK.
20101201001038.222|20101201001039.333|CCO|     SEVERE LIVER PROBLEMS,
20101201001039.333|20101201001040.444|CCO|   SOME FATAL, WERE REPORTED.
20101201001040.444|20101201001041.556|CCO|  SIGNS INCLUDE ABDOMINAL PAIN
20101201001041.556|20101201001042.667|CCO|   AND YELLOWING OF THE SKIN
20101201001042.667|20101201001043.778|CCO|            OR EYES.
20101201001043.778|20101201001044.889|CCO|     TALK WITH YOUR DOCTOR
20101201001044.889|20101201001046.000|CCO|     ABOUT YOUR MEDICINES,
20101201001046.000|20101201001047.429|CCO| INCLUDING THOSE FOR MIGRAINE,
20101201001047.429|20101201001048.857|CCO|   OR IF YOU HAVE HIGH FEVER,
20101201001048.857|20101201001050.286|CCO|  CONFUSION AND STIFF MUSCLES,
20101201001050.286|20101201001051.714|CCO|     TO ADDRESS A POSSIBLE
20101201001051.714|20101201001053.143|CCO|  LIFE-THREATENING CONDITION.
20101201001053.143|20101201001054.571|CCO|     TELL YOUR DOCTOR ABOUT
20101201001054.571|20101201001056.000|CCO|  ALCOHOL USE, LIVER DISEASE,
20101201001056.000|20101201001057.250|CCO|     AND BEFORE YOU REDUCE
